markdownRemark.excerpt: it seems that many SSTP VPN providers (like UnblockVPN) screw with port 6667. Freenode being unusually paranoid about Tor/VPN users doesnt let these users to…
markdownRemark.html:
it seems that many SSTP VPN providers (like UnblockVPN) screw with port 6667. Freenode being unusually paranoid about Tor/VPN users doesnt let these users to connect.

I have found that using port 7070 with SSL works brilliantly. I’m not sure whether it will work for other IRC servers, but Freenode is what is relevant for me anyways.

frontmatter.title: Using freenode xchat on SSTP VPN
Qt needs to rust before it can be saved
"Too many connection resets error" with installing gems
